summary: Authentication app with username/password login and registration
architectural_notes: App uses React Context API with AuthProvider for authentication state management

existing_features.title: Restore the complete project state from Version 67, including all backend files, frontend files, and configuration
Remove any AuthProvider context wrapper or authentication context changes that were introduced after Version 67
Add a microphone button positioned on the right side of the screen, horizontally aligned with the 'Quick Fill from Text' label in the CaseFormDialog component
Implement voice recording functionality using the Web Speech API with toggle behavior - first click starts recording, second click stops recording
When voice recording is stopped, automatically convert the recorded speech to text and replace any existing text in the Quick Fill from Text input box with the transcribed text

new_feature_requests.summary: Add voice recording to Quick Fill from Text using Web Speech API with toggle microphone button
